description:
Light and agile like a running shoe, built tough for technical trails. A new chassis system stabilizes your ankle, giving you support for carrying heavy loads while allowing your forefoot to flex naturally. Contagrip® outsoles with multi-directional lugs keep you upright and stable when you're moving fast over mixed terrain.

  • Anti-debris Mesh upper with structural synthetic overlays
  • SensiFit™ construction provides a precise, secure fit
  • Moulded OrthoLite® sockliner adds cushioning and breathability
  • Quicklace™ system provides a custom fit quickly
  • Gusseted tongues keep debris out
  • Advanced Chassis™ chassis stabilizes your ankle without limiting forefoot flexibility
  • Outsoles are non-marking Contagrip® rubber
  • Chevron lugs provide traction over a variety of directions and surfaces
name: Salomon X Ultra 4 Light Trail Shoes - Women's
